text.autoconfig.musicnotification.title: Music Notification - Config
text.autoconfig.musicnotification.option:
Mute the sound a toast make when it appears and disappears.
ENABLED_ALL = Vanilla (every toast will make sound)
MUTE_SELF = Mute toast of this mod
MUTE_ALL = Mute every toast
gui.musicnotification.playsound.title: PlaySoundScreen
